scripts.update-libs: npm update; mkdir -p lib/downloadjs;cp node_modules/downloadjs/download.min.js lib/downloadjs/; cp node_modules/downloadjs/LICENSE.md lib/downloadjs/; mkdir -p lib/pdf-lib;cp node_modules/pdf-lib/dist/pdf-lib.min.js lib/pdf-lib/;cp node_modules/pdf-lib/LICENSE.md lib/pdf-lib/;
scripts.build: mkdir -p build; cp lib build/ -r; cp src/* build/; cp static build/ -r;
scripts.serve: npm run build; node_modules/light-server/bin/light-server -o -s build -w "src/**/*.js, src/**/*.html # npm run build"; rm build -rf;
